Summary: seen 3 objects go into 1 and 1 hovered above my head
trends: There have been no other sightings in Trenton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailswas visiting friends in the country *(names deleted--cms\sg)they started fighting so i went outside on the front porch i started seeing flashing lights in the sky i thought they were moving stars they were so far away. they started going sideways up and down back and forth and i started flicking my lighter at them and then i saw them form into one object next thing i know it was hovering over my head there was no wind no heat no breeze from this object the colors were magnificent colors i have never seen before i was scared i was at edge of porch and started backing up towards front door and thats all i remember.then coming back into the house and everyone was sleeping it was like dusk.
